item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 26, 2025 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI adds MCP support to Agents SDK (145 points | 26 comments)
2. Debian bookworm live images now reproducible (243 points | 60 comments)
3. Malware found on NPM infecting local package with reverse shell (63 points | 35 comments)
4. Good-bye core types; Hello Go as we know and love it (122 points | 27 comments)
5. MCP server for Ghidra (109 points | 18 comments)
6. Botswana Successfully Launches First Satellite, Botsat-1 (58 points | 14 comments)
7. Sharding Pgvector (42 points | 5 comments)
8. Playwright Tools for MCP (12 points | 6 comments)
9. Kilo Code: Speedrunning open source coding AI (49 points | 41 comments)
10. Coordinating the Superbowl's visual fidelity with Elixir (586 points | 140 comments)
11. Exploring Ruby Ractors – I paid for for 10 cores I'm gonna use 10 cores (14 points | discuss)
12. Gemma3 Function Calling (45 points | 6 comments)
13. Problems with the Heap (10 points | discuss)
14. Weave (YC W25) is hiring a founding product engineer ( | hide)
15. Airline Demand Between Canada and United States Collapses, Down 70%+ (224 points | 210 comments)
16. Google will develop Android OS behind closed doors starting next week (93 points | 42 comments)
17. Writing Programs with Ncurses (17 points | 4 comments)
18. Heap-overflowing Llama.cpp to RCE (203 points | 44 comments)
19. 'Naive' science fan faces jail for plutonium import (80 points | 39 comments)
20. Linux kernel 6.14 is a big leap forward in performance and Windows compatibility (130 points | 81 comments)
21. An Interview with Zen Chief Architect Mike Clark (92 points | 5 comments)
22. Fragment of a human face aged over one million years discovered (60 points | 32 comments)
23. A love letter to the CSV format (165 points | 165 comments)
24. Google makes Android development private, will continue open source releases (11 points | discuss)
25. High-Performance PNG Decoding (58 points | 4 comments)
26. How to Delete Your 23andMe Data (13 points | 1 comment)
27. Fast columnar JSON decoding with arrow-rs (42 points | 7 comments)
28. Trapping misbehaving bots in an AI Labyrinth (190 points | 132 comments)
29. Pi Pico Rx – A crystal radio for the digital age? (115 points | 17 comments)
30. A glitch in an online survey replaced the word 'yes' with 'forks' (86 points | 33 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 26, 2025 at 8:20 PM UTC
